Adult.description: Mourning Doves are smaller and richer brown than Eurasian Collared-Doves, with a pointed tail and black spots on the back. Mourning Doves lack a black half-collar on the neck.

Adult/immature.description: White-winged Dove has large white patches on the wings, visible even when the wing is folded. It lacks the black neck crescent and white-tipped tail of Eurasian Collared-Dove.

African Collared-Doves are very rare in continental North America. They have white undertail coverts and wingtips that are only slightly darker than the wing and back. Eurasian Collared-Doves are gray under the tail, with dark gray wingtips.
